title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 26.2 - Requirement of superintendent's approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 26.2 - Requirement of superintendent's approval

State Regulations

No option granted by any bank shall become effective and no
shares shall be issued or purchased pursuant to any plan until the
superintendent has given final approval to such plan upon application
therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
26.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
